document_data.name: Diero Mivaldi
document_data.home:
[[Yhaunn]], [[Sembia]]
[[Vilhon Reach]]Indicated by his name, appearance, and profession, Diero is likely a man of [[Turmish]], though it is not explicitly stated.
document_data.mainbody: '''Diero Mivaldi''' was a trader who operated in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Diero was a a dark-skinned man who wore a green vest.
document_data.Activities: Diero was an oceangoing merchant who traded between [[Yhaunn]] in [[Sembia]] and the distant [[Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.History: In [[Eleasis]] of the {{YearlinkName|1373}}, Diero attended a prestigious party hosted by [[Ammanas Aumleagarr]] in Yhaunn, meeting prominent individuals such as the sage [[Arthagus]] of the Miracles and Moonmistress-Designate [[Feena Archwood]] of [[Moonshadow Hall]].
